name: Bul-Kathos's Solemn Vow
flavorText: Bul-Kathos strode as a giant among the ancients, and was the forefather to the barbarian tribes. This sword represents the sacred vow he made to protect Mount Arreat and the Worldstone.
flavorTextHtml: Bul-Kathos strode as a giant among the ancients, and was the forefather to the barbarian tribes. This sword represents the sacred vow he made to protect Mount Arreat and the Worldstone.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Increases Fury Generation by 15 (Barbarian Only)    
 During Whirlwind you gain 45% increased attack speed and movement speed.
